title: 启动游戏崩溃
author: qq1519212494
txt_content:
[14:58:58] [main/INFO] *** Hello Minecraft! Launcher 2.4.1.6 ***
[14:58:58] [main/INFO] Initialized settings.
[14:59:02] [AWT-EventQueue-0/INFO] Start generating launching command...
[14:59:03] [Game Launcher/INFO] Building process
[14:59:03] [Game Launcher/INFO] Logging in...
[14:59:03] [Game Launcher/INFO] Detecting libraries...
[14:59:03] [Game Launcher/INFO] Unpacking natives...
[14:59:07] [Game Launcher/INFO] *** Make shell command ***
[14:59:07] [Game Launcher/INFO] On making head command.
[14:59:07] [Game Launcher/INFO] Java Version: 1.8.0_121
[14:59:07] [Game Launcher/INFO] Java Platform: 64
[14:59:07] [Game Launcher/INFO] System Platform: 64
[14:59:07] [Game Launcher/INFO] System Physical Memory: 8079
[14:59:07] [Game Launcher/INFO] On making launcher args.
[14:59:07] [Game Launcher/INFO] Starting process
[14:59:07] [Game Launcher/INFO] Have started the process
[14:59:11] [ProcessMonitor/INFO] Process exit code: -1073740791
[14:59:11] [ProcessMonitor/ERROR] The game exited abnormally, exit code: -1073740791复制代码
Java(TM)Platform SE binary 已停止工作

换了好几个JAVA都没用啊   一直显示

replies.author: Mithey
replies.txt_content:
请确认显卡驱动版本 最新版的英伟达显卡驱动378.49会导致所有版本Minecraft无法启动 请安装修复版本或376.33及以下版本
旧版本 376.33 
http://www.geforce.cn/drivers/results/113549
GeForce Hot Fix driver version 378.57
修复版本 378.57
http://nvidia.custhelp.com/app/a ... zaWQvd2syYXNKYW4%3D
